channel.title: Just A Blip
channel.description: A fortnightly voyage through oceans of sound. Sometimes calm with clear skies, sometimes the lifeboats have to be deployed. All aboard!
channel.itunes:author: Glenn O\'Brien
channel.itunes:subtitle: A fortnightly voyage through oceans of sound. Sometimes calm with clear skies, sometimes the lifeboats have to be deployed. All aboard!

item.title: Just a Blip 063 LATE NIGHT SPESH - DDR - 16th May 2020
item.description:
Just A Blip 063 - Boxmoon Fest After Party
4ish hours of meandering dancefloor bangers for your own private lockdown party
Massive props to Declan Synott & Natalia Baylis for putting together the Boxmoon extravangza, roll on episode 2.
Les Artistes:
Glenn Branca / Fadoul / Muddy Waters / Dam Funk / Plustwo / Lowell / Kyoto / Ability II / Theo Parrish / Jimi Tenor / Marcel Dettman / Anthony Naples / Serious Intention / Kano / Frantique/ Ashford & Simpson / First Choice / T Connection / Anunaku / Talaboman / TR One / Peven Everett & Stacy Kidd / I:Cube / Daphni /Peter Frampton / Prince / DJ Funk / ANZ / Underground Resistance / India Jordan /Kasper Marott / Two Full Minds / DJ Spinn / Orbital / The Truper / Junior Reid / Teddman / Otim Alpha Ft Leo Palayeng Kenna ‎/ AK1200 feat.
